author: Alex Young
title: Report: BeyoncĂŠ still intends to headline Coachella despite pregnancy
text:
The revelation of BeyoncĂŠ â€™s pregnancy caught many by surprise, Coachella organizers included.
In January, the singer was announced as a headliner of this year’s festival. At that time and up until yesterday, festival organizers were unaware she was pregnant with twins, according to TMZ .
TMZ adds that Goldenvoice, the company behind Coachella, has attemptedÂ to reach out to BeyoncĂŠ’s representatives for more details, including how far along she is in her pregnancy. However, as of Thursday, they’ve yet to hear back.
Nevertheless, TMZ reports thatÂ BeyoncĂŠ still intends to headline the festival in April as long as the pregancy
, citing a source close to the singer. Goldenvoice is not activelyÂ looking for a replacement headliner.
Coachella goes down over two weekends, April 14th – 16th and 21st – 23rd, in Indio, California.
